segments.text: I'm looking at a kitchen, a busy scene frozen in time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman, engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that dish, a simple household chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But something else demands my attention, something quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water pouring over the edge in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a large puddle on the floor, expanding quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her foot, completely submerged in the spreading water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she shows absolutely no reactionâ€”her face utterly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of such an obvious mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wonder if she's completely lost in thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope she notices before she takes a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already glistening on the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is truly quite astonishing to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
